--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 10/20/03 12:56:48 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Worried, my dear?"hissed Hydras
> 
> Her optics looked at Hydras in a sort of blank hurt look. "Worry 
is the least 
> of my concerns. If what they say is true... & Unicron functions... 
we are in 
> for a VERY rough trial ahead." Her voice reflected her major 
concern.
